fields.value: Header photo is a section of a commemorative mural to the Atomic Cafe, in the above-ground courtyard of the soon-to-open Little Tokyo station of LAâ€™s Metro. I made the photo image used on the mural in 1988 or so. Photo by Nancy Matoba, aka Atomic Nancy.
